changeGroupNameAndDescription(string,str.notice: Changes the name and description of a group.

deleteGroup(string).notice: Deletes a group owned by the sender.

deleteMessageInTheGroup(string,string).notice: Deletes a message in a group.

joinGroup(string,string).notice: Allows a user to join a group.

leaveGroup(string).notice: Allows a user to leave a group.

modifyMessageInTheGroup(string,string,st.notice: Modifies a message in a group.

returnGroupMessagges(string).notice: Returns all messages inside a group.

returnUserGroups().notice: Returns all groups joined by the sender.

returnUsersInAGroup(string).notice: Returns all users in a group.

sendMessagesInAGroup(string,string).notice: Sends a message in a group.
